example.parse: (S (VP (PSEUDO_VERB إن) (NP-SBJ-1 (PRON_1S ي)) (S (S (PP (PREP ب) (NP (PRON_2MP كم))) (VP (IV1S+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I أرفع) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *-1)) (NP-OBJ (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC الرأس)))) (CONJ و) (S (VP (IV1S+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I أتباهى) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *-1)) (PP-CLR (PREP ب) (SBAR (SUB_CONJ أن) (S (NP-SBJ (PRON_1S ني)) (NP-PRD (NP (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_INDEF_NOM ابنة) (CONJ و) (NOUN+CASE_INDEF_NOM أخت)) (PP (PREP ل) (NP (PRON_2MP كم))))

arg.g: because I am a daughter of Your sister
